arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start()

	-- Reset, then Wait to allow Reset to breathe
	tClasses = {}
	tPlayers = {}
	
	-- Disable runes
	for i, idRune in ipairs(tRunes) do
		ResetRune(idRune)
	end

	Hydra.Wait(fWaitTime)
	
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffect(ID_FX_HOST, idActiveFX)

end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)
	
	-- Play VFX
	--Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idWell, FX_WELL_BURST)
	idActiveFX = Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_FX_HOST, FX_WELL_ACTIVE, true)
		
	-- Grant Title
	Hydra.AchievementSendEvent(idActorPlayer, "WellWisherEvent")

	-- Save player
	table.insert(tPlayers, idActorPlayer)

	-- Check class
	sNewClass = Hydra.PlayerGetClass(idActorPlayer)
	bDupe = false
	
	for i, sClass in ipairs(tClasses) do
		if sNewClass == sClass then
			bDupe = true
		end
	end
	
	-- TEST
	--bDupe = false
	
	if bDupe == false then
		-- If this class has not yet Wished, activate the next Wish
		table.insert(tClasses, sNewClass)
		Hydra.EventSend("SMP_WELL_WISH", idActorPlayer, #tClasses)
	else
		-- Class dupelicate; Reset
		Hydra.EventSend("SMP_WELL_REFILL")
	end

end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)

	-- Test Code
	--TestVar = TestVar + 1
	--nUserParam = TestVar

	if nUserParam == 1 then
		LightRune(RUNE1)
		-- No effect, title is the only effect at first tier
	elseif nUserParam == 2 then
		LightRune(RUNE2)
		-- Apply debuff to nearby players
		Hydra.Wait(0.5)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idWell, FX_WELL_SHADOW)
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtTarget(idWell, idWell, WELL_POWER)
	elseif nUserParam == 3 then
		LightRune(RUNE3)
		-- Kill nearby Ambients, knock down players/monsters
		Hydra.Wait(0.5)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_FX_HOST, FX_WELL_DEMONIC)
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtTarget(idWell, ID_FX_HOST, WELL_POWER_AMBIENT)
	elseif nUserParam == 4 then
		LightRune(RUNE4)
		-- Start Firestorm at Well
		fWaitTime = 20
		Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(FIRESTORM, "BUFF_WINDUP", idWell)
	elseif nUserParam == 5 then
		LightRune(RUNE5)
		-- Grant Rings to players who spent coins
		for i, idPlayer in ipairs(tPlayers) do
			if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idPlayer) then
				Hydra.TreasureClassDropAtActorForPlayer(idWell, WELL_RING, idPlayer)
			end
		end
	elseif nUserParam == 6 then
		-- Unused for now
	end

end

function Start()

	-- Wait before passing through, disables Well so the effects of the Wish can breathe
	Hydra.Wait(fWaitTime)
	
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffect(ID_FX_HOST, idActiveFX)

end

unk_993f312:
tClasses = {}
tPlayers = {}
tRunes = {RUNE1, RUNE2, RUNE3, RUNE4, RUNE5}
tRuneFX = {}
idActiveFX = nil

fWaitTime = 5
TestVar = 0

idWell = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idSelf, "Well")[1]
Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(idWell, 2)
Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(ID_FX_HOST, 1.5)

for i, idRune in ipairs(tRunes) do
	RuneSetup(idRune)
end

tRuneFX[RUNE1] = Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(RUNE1, RUNE1_VFX, true)
tRuneFX[RUNE2] = Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(RUNE2, RUNE2_VFX, true)
tRuneFX[RUNE3] = Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(RUNE3, RUNE3_VFX, true)
tRuneFX[RUNE4] = Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(RUNE4, RUNE4_VFX, true)
tRuneFX[RUNE5] = Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(RUNE5, RUNE5_VFX, true)
